title: Chalice of the Abbot Suger of Saint-Denis
medium: sardonyx cup with heavily gilded silver mounting, adorned with filigrees set with stones, pearls, glass insets, and opaque white glass pearls
dimensions:
overall (height): 18.4 cm (7 1/4 in.)
overall (diam. at base): 11.7 cm (4 5/8 in.)
overall (diam. at top): 12.4 cm (4 7/8 in.)
